data.text:
American television host, journalist, and author, Brooke Baldwin, is one of the most famous women in the United States. She became famous following her 13-year stint at CNN. Because of her impressive journalism skills, she has won the hearts of many people globally. She has also made incredible wealth from her career.

Brooke Baldwin has become a household name in the United States. Besides being an experienced television host, she is also an author. She has published a book titled Huddle: How Women Unlock Their Collective Power. So, what do you know about the former CNN news anchor?

Brooke Baldwin's biography

Baldwin was born on July 12th, 1979, in Atlanta, Georgia, in the United States. She was raised in a middle-class family in the same place. Brooke Baldwin's parents were regular workers.

Her mother was a teacher, while her father worked as a consultant at Deloitte. Unfortunately, her mother succumbed to cancer when she was only 12 years old. She is a distant cousin to Alec, Stephen, and Willian Baldwin, who are all in the entertainment industry.

Educational background

Brooke attended Westminster private schools. She then joined the University of North Carolina and graduated with a double major in journalism and Spanish in 2001. She also spent time at the Universidad Iberoamericana in Mexico City as a part of her studies in Spanish.

Profession

She joined WVIR-TV in Charlottesville, Virginia, in 2001 after graduating. She later landed another job as a morning anchor at the WOWK-TV channel. She worked there for a while before moving to Washington, DC, where she became a lead reporter for WTTG news.

After gaining considerable experience, she got hired by CNN in 2008. She worked as the network's anchor from 2 pm to 4 pm ET on weekdays. Then, in 2011, she got an exciting opportunity to co-anchor the coverage of Space Shuttle Atlantis' final launch.

In 2012, she created a documentary titled To Catch a Serial Killer. The documentary won a Silver World Medal for Best Investigative Report. The medal was awarded at the New York Festivals International Television & Film Awards.

In June 2012, Baldwin and Piers Morgan hosted CNN's Queen Elizabeth's Diamond Jubilee in London. She has also covered two presidential inaugurations. First, she worked at Barack Obama's second inauguration in 2013. Then, four years later, she was assigned to report from Donald Trump's ceremony.

Brooke has also tried a hand in acting. In 2009, she was featured in a film titled Drunkard. But, unfortunately, she only made a brief appearance of only 15 minutes.

Why is Brooke Baldwin not on CNN anymore?

On February 16th 2021, Baldwin shocked her CNN viewers by announcing her exit from the network. She said that she was "so grateful" for their "loyalty and passion". But why did she leave CNN despite her substantial annual salary?

Brooke revealed that one of the main reasons was that she was beginning to feel too comfortable. Unfortunately, she did not disclose other reasons. Her future remains unclear.

Awards and achievements

Baldwin has performed tremendously in her career. As a result, she has been nominated for two popular awards. Below are some of these awards:

In 2015, she was nominated for the Emmy Award for Outstanding Live Coverage of a Current News Story - Long Form.

In 2018, she was nominated for the Emmy Award for Outstanding Breaking News Coverage.

What is Brooke Baldwin's net worth?

Her net worth is a whopping $10 million. She has made her fortune from her career as a journalist and television host. So, how much does Brooke Baldwin make?

While she worked with CNN, her annual salary at CNN was alleged to be $4 million. She is worth more than her husband. Brooke Baldwin's husband net worth is $1.7 million. Nonetheless, their wealth affords them and their children a luxurious lifestyle.

Is Brooke Baldwin married?

The former CNN news reported is a married woman. She is married to James Fletcher, an English producer. They got engaged in 2017 and tied the knot in 2018.

Fletcher has worked on the television documentary titled The Cameron Years. The film is about former British Prime Minister David Cameron. Additionally, he produced and directed the political documentary called The Accidental President. It is about how Donald Trump ascended to power when everyone thought Hillary Clinton would win.

Who are Brooke Baldwin's children? Brooke and James Fletcher have been married for three years now. They do not have any children.

Quick facts about Brooke Baldwin

How old is Brooke Baldwin? She was born on July 12th, 1979. As of 2021, she is 42 years old.

Why is Brooke Baldwin no longer on CNN? She left the network in early 2021.

Who replaced Brooke Baldwin on CNN? Alisyn Camerota and Victor Blackwell replaced her.

Who does Brooke Baldwin work for? She has maintained a lower profile since her exit from CNN. It is unclear what she is doing currently.

Does Brooke Baldwin have a child? She doe not have a child.

Is CNN Brooke Baldwin related to Alec Baldwin? They are related. He is her distant cousin.

How long did Brooke Baldwin work for CNN? She worked at the network for around 13 years. She joined in 2008 and left in 2021.
